course.title: MAT 3341 Applied Linear Algebra (3 units)
course.desc: Vector and matrix norms. Schur canonical form, QR, LU, Cholesky and singular value decomposition, generalized inverses, Jordan form, Cayley-Hamilton theorem, matrix analysis and exponentials of matrices, eigenvalue estimation and the Gershgorin Circle Theorem; quadratic forms, Rayleigh and minima principles. This course includes proofs and applications of computational methods.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: (MAT 1322 or MAT 1325), (MAT 2141 or MAT 2342).
